auth_sentence.content: In skaldic poetry, there is no nonsense about free verse.

auth_sentence.content: The last section of his "Edda" demonstrates more than a hundred different skaldic verse-forms.

auth_sentence.content: When some of Snorri's allies attacked an old woman, local revulsion expressed itself in skaldic poems directed against Snorri.
